00008 {
00009  kprints((char*) (SYSCALL_ARGUMENTS.rdi));

00021 case SYSCALL_DEBUGGER:
00022 {
00023  /* Enable the bochs iodevice and force a return to the debugger. */
00024  outw(0x8a00, 0x8a00);
